article: When Wilson got to the airport, _ flight was already being called _ the loudspeakers. The day before he had given up his _ for a morning flight and had booked an afternoon _ instead. He had to go to the reservations desk to collect his _ ticket. He apologized for being _ .The reservations clerk smiled and began to look through the reservations in front of her. Then her _ disappeared and _ began to look _ . "Your ticket doesn't seem to be here, " she said. "Let me check it with the computer. "The _ clicked and whirred and _ began to flash just then , his flight was called a second time. Wilson became very _ . _ the girl looked _ . "There's been a mistake. Your new ticket was sent to you by post. That's why it isn't here", she said. _ took her only a _ time to write _ a new one. Wilson managed to catch the plane just before it took _ . "What a way to start a _ !" he thought.
